snippet: Trying to meet students’ demands for global knowledge, universities are providing instruction in culture, customs, religious practices and even body language around the world.
abstract: Continuing education departments at colleges and universities, in attempt to meet students’ demands for global knowledge, are providing instruction in culture, customs, and negotiation strategies; interest has been strong as businesses recognize that more of their revenue will come from foreign countries.
lead_paragraph: Trying to meet students’ demands for global knowledge, universities are providing instruction in culture, customs, religious practices and even body language around the world.

headline.seo: Continuing Education Programs Expand Global Focus
headline.main: More Courses Get You Ready to Face the World
